column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Started w/ a seafood tower as appetizer...amazing w/ crab
column3: oysters & salmon ceviche.  Blue cheese wedge salad was the best I have ever had w/ a hint of dill in the dressing and pork belly bacon
column4: delicious. Mashed potatoes w/ garlic so good
column5: as was creamed spinach.  All steaks cooked to perfection including
column6: dry aged  bone-in Ribeye & bone-in filet.  Finished w/ a pot of French press coffee & chocolate pie.  The best meal.
